orig_text: More description of the set of checks performed using the checksum field is provided in Section 3.1 of [RFC6396].
correct_text: More description of the set of checks performed using the checksum field is provided in Section 3.1 of [RFC6936].
notes: The wrong RFC was referenced under "Checksum Guidelines" Section 3.4, including the same wrong RFC information within the "Informative References" Section 8.2.
